document_data.caption: A map showing the Central Ward of Skuld outlined in red.
document_data.name: Central Ward of Skuld
document_data.mainbody: The '''Central Ward''' was a walled section of the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Central Ward was sat in the middle of Skuld. The district's borders touched those of every other ward and district in the city, and its southern border ran along the north bank of the [[River of Shadows]].
document_data.Description: The Central Ward was surrounded by walls. Gates provided access to every other part of Skuld including the [[Skuld/Warehouse District|Warehouse District]], [[Skuld/Merchant District|Merchant District]], and [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]].

* [[Temple of Isis (Skuld)|Temple of Isis]]
* [[Cryer's Square]]
